medical_history.chief_complaint: 66-pound weight loss and alternating bowel habits
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 year ago with weight loss; progressive stiffness and slowness of movements appeared a few months before the presentation, along with mood depression, apathy, hyporexia, hyposmia, constipation, micrographia, dysphagia, hypophonia, and sleep disturbances.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic B-cell leukemia; hypogammaglobulinemia; elevated Î²2 microglobulin; acute leukopenia; previous cardiac arrhythmia.
medical_history.family_history: Sister had multiple sclerosis; daughter had depression.
